body.name: sofree bedding Full Size Mattress, 10 Inch Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress, Full Mattress in a Box for Motion Isolation, Strong Edge Support, Medium Firm
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 48 mins
features: Premium Material for Health: Sofree bedding full size mattress adopted 3D soft knitted fabric on the top cover which is breathable and moisture-absorbing, the memory foam inside full mattress is CertiPUR US Certified for safety & durability, friendly for all people including pregnant and kids, you can sleep on our mattress full size with confidence.

Pocket Spring for Better Support: Our hybrid mattress full constructed by hundreds of individual pocketed spring coils which offers you with enough support from head to toe and the hybrid construction create medium-firm feel, no worry about sagging. The full bed mattress added high-density foam and reinforced coils to enhance edge support, avoid the feeling of falling, and give better protection for you and your families.

Suitable for All Sleepers: This 10 inch mattress full size is ergonomically designed to conform your curves and keep spinal alignment, relieve pressure points and let go of your fatigue. The comfort memory foam layer can support your body in every position to provide a whole night of peaceful sleep, it is ideal for all body types and sleep styles.

Motion Isolation for Soundly Sleep: The individual innerspring pocket coils in our full bed mattress work independently, it tends to reduce noise and isolate motion when you move, effectively avoid movement interference between partners, create a quiet and undisturbed sleep with this pillow top memory foam mattress.

Package & 100 Nights Trial: Our mattress ships compressed, rolled, and boxed in packaging. Simply unbox, unroll and safe to sleep on, please wait 48-72 hours to fully expand and any potential odor to dissipate. You will get 100 nights trial and 10 years support for this full mattress. We commit to offer you a good sleep, please feel free to contact us at any time for support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This mattress is terrific and a great buy for the money! Star of the Show!
reviews.reviewText: There are several reasons that I like this mattress. The first one is the price. At $203.99 for a full size, you cannot beat this mattress for its quality and low price. Secondly, I was pleasantly surprised by how easy it was to install! You just need to unroll it, wait a few minutes, and then place it wherever you want it. The third and last reason for loving this mattress is how incredibly comfortable it is. It is like sleeping on a little bit of heaven! If you want to purchase an absolutely AWESOME mattress for an incredible price, one that is easy to place wherever you want it, and one that is super simple to set up, THIS IS THE ONE THAT YOU WANT! Sofree...the mattress that everyone should have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice firm mattress. Great value 👍!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son and wasn't sure what to expect when it came in a small box. I was very impressed by the quality of the material and the comfort. Comparable features to more expensive mattresses. Setup was easy. Full size was pretty easy to manage by myself. I unrolled the mattress onto the bed frame before piercing the vacuum seal which made it easier to position. Seems like it should wear well. Would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This mattress is made for side sleepers.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this hybrid mattress for my daughter who is a side sleeper. She says the new mattress is very comfortable and soft. It comes with side-support. Having sides that don’t sag is a plus. It is a high-quality mattress that is very affordable. It was shipped compressed in a box which made it easy to move through the house. I give it five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for those not picky.
reviews.reviewText: As someone in need of a cost-effective sleeping solution, I decided to try the Sofree Bedding Full Size Mattress, particularly attracted by its combination of memory foam and spring design, along with its affordability.Pros:Price: The most appealing aspect of this mattress is its affordability. It's a budget-friendly option for those who need a new mattress without breaking the bank.Hybrid Design: The combination of memory foam and springs is a major plus. The memory foam conforms to the body, providing decent comfort and support, while the springs add a traditional mattress feel.Ease of Setup: The mattress comes compressed and rolled in a box, making it easy to set up. It expands quickly once unwrapped.Cons:Comfort Level: While the mattress is comfortable, it doesn't quite reach the luxurious feel of some higher-end models. It's sufficient for a good night's sleep but may not satisfy those looking for premium comfort.Durability: Given its price point, I have some reservations about its long-term durability. It seems sturdy enough for now, but time will tell how it holds up.Firmness: The mattress leans towards the firmer side. If you prefer a plush, deeply cushioned feel, this might not be the mattress for you.Conclusion: The Sofree Bedding Full Size Mattress is a solid choice for anyone looking for a basic, no-frills mattress. It's great as a starter mattress or for a guest room. The hybrid design offers a balance of comfort and support, making it a versatile choice. However, if you're seeking a mattress with advanced features or ultra-soft comfort, you might want to explore other options. For its price, it's a commendable choice, especially for those on a tight budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect teen mattress
reviews.reviewText: Got this for a larger (full) mattress to replace a twin for my teenager. They said it is soft and comfortable and works perfect for their new bed. Shipping was fast and it "inflated" fast with no weird smells.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softest, comfiest mattress ever!
reviews.reviewText: Look no further for a great mattress at such a great price! And how easy to get a mattress delivered in a box to your door! It expanded into its full fluffiness in no time at all. I have back issues and yet I slept like a baby on it. Can’t recommend it enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Okay, so when you buy a mattress in a box off of Amazon, how “good” can it be? Good isn’t even the word. It’s GREAT! I bought this in a full size for a guest room. Not only did it arrive within 2 days, it came in a box that was easy to carry up the stairs of a tiny house. It was easy to set up. Unboxed it, and let it sit a few days. It’s firm, comfortable, and definitely far better quality that I ever would have imagined. I’d definitely buy this again!!! Might get one for my own bed…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The description says soft but I will say it’s still a bit more firm than I was expecting, but still very comfortable! Fast shipping, easy to open and place, all in all I’m super pleased!
